headline: Closing Bell Movers: Tesla jumps on Musk plans to pare back his DOGE work
summary: In the opening hour of the evening session, U.S. equity futures are sharply higher, tacking on to broad-based gains seen during Tuesday’s regular hours. S&P 500 futures are up 1.6% above 5,400, Nasdaq 100 is up 2% above 18,700, and Dow Industrials are up 1.4% just shy of 40,000. Comments from President Trump that he has no intention of firing Fed Chairman Powell, but rather only prefers him to move faster on cutting rates, are helping restore constructive sentiment and reverse concerns that capi

headline: Capital One CEO says US consumers are in 'good shape,' but there are 'worrying signs'
summary: Capital One CEO Richard Fairbank on Tuesday shared his perspective on how American consumers are holding up during the financial institution’s quarterly earnings call.

headline: Why Shares of Capital One Are Rising Today
summary: Shares of the large lender Capital One (NYSE: COF) were trading nearly 5% higher at noon today.  Capital One reported adjusted earnings per share of $4.06, well ahead of analyst estimates.  Furthermore, Capital One recently received regulatory approval for its pending acquisition of Discover Financial Services.

raw.headline: Why Shares of Capital One Are Rising Today
raw.summary: Shares of the large lender Capital One (NYSE: COF) were trading nearly 5% higher at noon today.  Capital One reported adjusted earnings per share of $4.06, well ahead of analyst estimates.  Furthermore, Capital One recently received regulatory approval for its pending acquisition of Discover Financial Services.

headline: Consumers Are a 'Source of Strength' for the US Economy, Capital One CEO Says

headline: COF Stock Up 2.8% on Q1 Earnings Beat, NII Rises on Upbeat Card Spend
summary: Solid auto loan originations and credit card spend, and lower funding costs drive Capital One's Q1 NII growth. This, along with higher fee income, aids earnings.

headline: COF Up as Q1 Earnings Beat on Higher NII & Fee Income, Provisions Dip
summary: An increase in total revenues and lower provisions support Capital One's Q1 earnings, while a decline in loan balance and higher expenses act as spoilsports.

raw.headline: COF Up as Q1 Earnings Beat on Higher NII & Fee Income, Provisions Dip

headline: Capital One readies for Discover integration work
summary: With Discover, “we will be going back into the world of data centers” for “a number of years,” Capital One CEO Richard Fairbank said Tuesday.
